p: The flavonoids rutin, quercetin, and hesperidin were found to have anti-inflammatory effects. Plants such as onions ( Allium cepa) contain a high concentration of quercetin and studies confirmed the anti-inflammatory activities of onion juice and extracts. Abutilon indicum also contains high amounts of quercetin and has significant anti-inflammatory activity. Besides, garlic contains large amounts of allicin which exerts potent anti-inflammatory effects [ 97, 98, 99].
